005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.ArrayException;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.List;
022
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
024
025public final class ArrayInsertBefore {
026  @NonNull
027  public static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
028      .name("insert-before")
029      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
030      .deterministic()
031      .contextIndependent()
032      .focusIndependent()
033      .argument(IArgument.builder()
034          .name("array")
035          .type(IArrayItem.class)
036          .one()
037          .build())
038      .argument(IArgument.builder()
039          .name("position")
040          .type(IIntegerItem.class)
041          .one()
042          .build())
043      .argument(IArgument.builder()
044          .name("member")
045          .type(IItem.class)
046          .zeroOrMore()
047          .build())
048      .returnType(IArrayItem.class)
049      .returnOne()
050      .functionHandler(ArrayInsertBefore::execute)
051      .build();
052
053  private ArrayInsertBefore() {
054    // disable construction
055  }
056
057  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
058  @NonNull
059  private static <T extends ICollectionValue> ISequence<IArrayItem<T>> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
060      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
061      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
062      IItem focus) {
063    IArrayItem<T> array = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
064        arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
065    IIntegerItem position = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
066    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked") T member = (T) ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(2)).toCollectionValue();
067
068    return ISequence.of(insertBefore(array, position, member));
069  }
070
071  /**
072   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
073   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-insert-before">array:insert-before</a>.
074   *
075   * @param <T>
076   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
077   * @param array
078   *          the target Metapath array
079   * @param positionItem
080   *          the integer position of the item to insert before
081   * @param member
082   *          the Metapath item to insert into the identified array
083   * @return a new array containing the modification
084   * @throws ArrayException
085   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
086   */
087  @NonNull
088  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> insertBefore(
089      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
090      @NonNull IIntegerItem positionItem,
091      @NonNull T member) {
092    return insertBefore(array, positionItem.asInteger().intValueExact(), member);
093  }
094
095  /**
096   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
097   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-insert-before">array:insert-before</a>.
098   *
099   * @param <T>
100   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
101   * @param array
102   *          the target Metapath array
103   * @param position
104   *          the integer position of the item to insert before
105   * @param member
106   *          the Metapath item to insert into the identified array
107   * @return a new array containing the modification
108   * @throws ArrayException
109   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
110   */
111  @NonNull
112  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> insertBefore(
113      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
114      int position,
115      @NonNull T member) {
116    return ArrayJoin.join(ObjectUtils.notNull(List.of(
117        ArraySubarray.subarray(array, 1, position - 1),
118        IArrayItem.of(member),
119        ArraySubarray.subarray(array, position))));
120  }
121}
